title: Первый раз прощается
overview: The owner of a factory, Tatiana decides that on the anniversary of their marriage with Gleb, she will give him the reins of government - this will be the best gift. However, on the same day the woman finds out that in her hometown where Gleb often goes on a business trip, her husband has another woman and a little daughter. Happy plans for the future are collapsing, Tatiana decides to break all relations with her husband. But then Gleb has a heart attack ...
